item.title: Contact
item.description: Mail: bjoern.fisseler@fernuni-hagen.de Phone: +49 2331 987 2211 Postal: FernUniversität in Hagen, Fakultät für Psychologie, Universitätstr. 27, 58097 Hagen, Germany

item.title: Publications
item.description: Books, Edited books Fisseler, B. (Ed.) (2019). Symposium Four: New Practices: Proceedings from the Ed-ICT international network: Disabled students, ICT, post-compulsory education & employment: In search of new solutions. Retrieved from https://ub-deposit.fernuni-hagen.de/receive/mir_mods_00001507 Fisseler, B., & Aktionsbündnis für Barrierefreie Informationstechnik (Eds.) (2008). Digital informiert - im Job integriert Dokumentation AbI-kongress 2008, 9. Und 10. April 2008, berlin. Volmarstein; Wetter: Evang. Stiftung; Forschungsinst. Technologie und Behinderung. Thesis Fisseler, B. (2013). Barrierefreies E-Learning an Hochschulen.

item.title: Talks
item.description: Invited Talks Inclusion and Digitisation in Higher Education. Plattform Zukunft Inklusion (ZINK). January 2019, University of Hildesheim, Hildesheim, Germany. Digitisation in Higher Education – Status Quo und Perspectives. iDA course on „Digitalisierung und Diversität“. December 2018, Berlin, Germany. The Ed-ICT International Network – Digitisation in Higher Education. Inklusionstage 2018. November 2018, Berlin, Germany. On the way to accessible higher education teaching. Short keynote at a workshop. June 2018, Goethe University, Frankfurt a.
